body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes       There are no fees to enter National Mall and Memorial Parks. Timed entry tickets are required for entry into the Washington Monument and Ford's Theatre National Historic Site. Service fees may apply to advanced tickets.       Washington Monument (service fee for advance tickets)      Ford's Theatre National Historic Site (service fees for advance tickets)
title: National Mall and Memorial Parks: Fees & Passes
